meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rob Wivchar Jack Rice Matt Lisiecki Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7712.

td.p: Rob Wivchar, a musician from Denver, Colorado
Jack Rice, a marketing associate from Portland, Oregon
Matt Lisiecki, an international development researcher from Brooklyn, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $34,551)

tr.td: NAME THAT POET!
THE VEGAN LIFE
DIRECT ME TO THE DIRECTIONAL UNIVERSITY
TV
2 LETTERS DIFFERENT
SLOVENIA & SLOVAKIA

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Rob: Who is Bruce?)

(Rabbie) Burns

MattRob
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '"Scots, wha hae wi\' Wallace bled, Scots, wham Bruce has aften led"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

(Alex: USC is not necessarily one.)

University of Southern California

Rob
')
